mapper.select: SELECT sa.id as sa_id,sav.id as sav_id,sa.*,sav.*,IF(psav.sku_id,1,0) as isChecked FROM pms_product_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN pms_product_sale_attr_value sav ON sa.product_id = sav.product_id AND sa.sale_attr_id = sav.sale_attr_id AND sa.product_id = #{productId} LEFT JOIN pms_sku_sale_attr_value psav on psav.sale_attr_value_id = sav.id and psav.sku_id=#{skuId}
